name: A Melancholic Doll
description:
It's been a long time since they've left.  When are they coming back?  All you can do all day is watch the clock and reminisce about when they were here. 

This is a game made for the 6th Annual Driftwood Jam: Build Your Own Game Jam!

Plugin Credits:

Yanfly: http://yanfly.moe

SumRndmDde: http://sumrndm.site
